page.title: 09OWERMOIGNE'S FEATURES
page.content: {THOMAS HARDY'S WESSEX TALE "THE {DISTRACTED PREACHER"}WAS BASED ON SMUGGLING IN OWERMOIGNE.A COTTAGE NEAR {EAST FARM}AND THE{CHURCH}FEATURE IN HIS STORY.THIS WORKING FARM IS AN 18TH CENTURY BUILDING.{CHILBURY COTTAGE, } THATCHED AND WITH ELIZABETHAN ORIGINS WAS PROBABLY INVOLVED WITH THE SMUGGLING.A NEARBY CLEFT STORED BRANDY PENDING "ALL CLEAR" SIGNALS FROM THE CHURCH TOWER.{RECTORY}HAS 16TH CENTURY WOODEN BEAMS FROM SHIP OF {THE SPANISH ARMADA},A BLOCKED UP SMUGGLER'S WINDOW AND REPUTEDLY A SECRET SMUGGLER'S PASSAGE LEADING TOWARDS{RINGSTEAD}.TWO TREES IN GARDEN ARE SUPPOSED TO HAVE BEEN PAINTED BY{JOHN CONSTABLE}WHILST ON HONEYMOON AT OSMINGTON.ADAM JONES'S WILL 1653,ON VIEW IN CHURCH LED TO THE BUILDING OF{THREE CHARITY {COTTAGES.
